import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import * as chartData from '../../../../shared/data/dashboard/online-course' @Component({ selector: 'app-activity-hours', templateUrl: './activity-hours.component.html', styleUrls: ['./activity-hours.component.scss'] }) export class ActivityHoursComponent { public activityChart = chartData.activityChart public show: boolean= false constructor(){} toggle() { this.show = !this.show } }
